text: Václav Vorlíček (3 June 1930 – 5 February 2019) was a Czech movie director. He was born in Prague. His best known works were Who Wants to Kill Jessie?, The End of Agent W4C and The Girl on the Broomstick. His career began in 1953. He worked with screenwriter Miloš Macourek many times. He directed several children's and fairytale movies. Vorlíček died on 5 February 2019 at a hospital in Prague from lung cancer, aged 88.Zemřel Václav Vorlíček, režisér Tří oříšků pro Popelku ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1930 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:Czech movie directors Category:People from Prague
title: Václav Vorlíček
